grayscale¶

Functions for grayscale line patrol module

Define the returned value of angle status detected by the 8-way grayscale module

ANGLE_N45¶
ANGLE_0¶
ANGLE_45¶
ANGLE_90¶
ANGLE_ERROR¶

Define the returned value of angle offset status detected by the 8-way grayscale module

OFFSET_N1¶
OFFSET_0¶
OFFSET_1¶
OFFSET_ERROR¶
byte gsRead()¶

Read the value of 8-way grayscale module.

Returns

byte eg:0b01001001

uint16_t gsGetAngleOffset()¶

Get the angle value and offset value of 8-way grayscale module. 

uint16_t result = gsGetAngleOffset();
uint8_t angleType = result >> 8 & 0xFF;
uint8_t offsetType = result & 0xFF;

Returns

uint16_t
